statements: DELETE FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_taken = true;
DELETE FROM patient_medication_tracking WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND medication_dosage = '100mg';
DELETE FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE patient_id = 123 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM Medication WHERE patient_id = 1 AND frequency = 'daily';
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'female';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage = 100.5
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE patient_id = '52f2ce59-87cf-4b59-9e5f-21de6cc2b0f3' AND reminder_time < '2022-01-01'
